location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 20/18(3) 'Muscat: Muscat Oil Concession: Personnel of Petroleum Concessions Ltd.'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the back to the front.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 16; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Correspondence and notes concerning the employment of two American geologists by Petroleum Development (Oman and Dhofar) Limited for exploration work in Oman. Consent is sought for the employment of non-British subjects in accordance with the political agreement between Petroleum Development (Oman and Dhofar) Limited and the British government (see IOR/L/PS/12/2976). The file contains the exchange of correspondence over the matter between officials at the India Office (Political Department), Petroleum Department, and the Political Residency.
